title: Farfalle with Italian sausage, tomatoes and cream
ingredients: ['350g farfalle pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '500g Italian sausage, casings removed and diced', '1/2 teaspoon red chilli flakes', '1 small onion, diced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (400g) tins plum tomatoes, drained and coarsely chopped', '350ml double cream', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '3 tablespoons minced fresh parsley']
